On August 25, 2025, the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) approved a major restructuring plan for Tata Motors .

Key details of the NCLT-sanctioned plan :

Demerger: The commercial vehicle (CV) business of Tata Motors will be demerged into a separate entity, TML Commercial Vehicles Limited (TMLCV).

Amalgamation: The passenger vehicle (PV) business will be merged with Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Limited (TMPV).

Purpose: The restructuring aims to create a more streamlined corporate structure to improve operational efficiency and long-term growth for each distinct business segment.
